item.title: About
item.description: I’m a husband and father of two boys. I’m originally from Havelock North, New Zealand but currently based in Melbourne, Australia.

item.title: Big Ol' List Of Quotes
item.description: A scratchpad for quotes that epitomize my personal philosophy. “Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
